attributes.action: use emergency powers to ensure the immediate disbanding of Simply Red and not require the nation to wait for their voluntary action of 2009.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mick Hucknall has been reported as saying that Simply Red will disband in 2009 on the occasion of their 25th anniversary. Even the most casual analysis would reveal that Simply Red have been producing banal muzak for that period and further aural abuse should be disallowed.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
